_sText:
De_foodcourt - Bomb-Defuse
By Amstrad (hated.proud at gmail dot com)

A group of fanatical Terrorists has taken control of Oak Lake Galleria and are now intent on detonating a package of C4 explosives at it's heart. A hastily assembled Counter-Terrorism unit has been dispatched to the scene.

Terrorists: Eliminate all opposition and plant the C4 explosives at the foodcourt's center.

Counter-Terrorists: Prevent the Terrorists from succesfully detonating their package.

-------------------------------------------------

This will be my first map completed to a great enough degree that I feel it release worthy. As such I've taken my time to make sure it has a touch of polish before I kicked it out the door. Map includes custom textures as well as the overview and radar maps. The bot nav-file was not tuned but appears to be balanced after some observation.

I'm sure I missed something or screwed up somewhere.
Comments, suggestions for improvement or flames (if you feel it necessary) are all welcome at my email.
